about_the_game:
This is an application to allow the instant creation of creatures to bring to your table top rpg campaigns to encite the unknown to your players. This is not a full fledged game on its own, but you will be able to roll dice for its stat block and attacks. You will be able to save creatures that you have made, and even share the seed generated by each unique creature so others can view or use it for their campaigns.

You will be able to alter the stats of the monsters by changing its challenge rating and have its values update in real time, allowing you to easily change a difficult creature to something a little easier to hit, or something thats hits a little harder.
